subject: Soccer
Appointments and Executive Changes
World War II (1939-45)
lead_paragraph: Controversy has swirled around Paolo di Canio since his appointment as manager of Sunderland was announced, and it seems to be a huge gamble to avoid relegation in the Premier League.
snippet: Controversy has swirled around Paolo di Canio since his appointment as manager of Sunderland was announced, and it seems to be a huge gamble to avoid relegation in the Premier League.
